Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Oldsmobile Light Tonneau
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
The Oldsmobile Light Tonneau, introduced in 1905, was an early automobile featuring a larger, more powerful design compared to the earlier Curved Dash model. It had a four-seat, open-top body style known as a "tonneau," with a rear seating area that could be accessed via a side door. Powered by a two-cylinder engine, it offered more horsepower and improved performance.

Consumes a lot of fuel, and is best used for short to medium distances.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x2
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
